summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4269 for the improvement of the alley in Block 1, Mades' First Addition, being the alley from West Hanford Street to West Stevens Street, between 45th Avenue Southwest and 46th Avenue Southwest; by grading, under Ordinance No. 50760, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
